Text_Template 1.1
=================

This is the list of changes for the Text_Template 1.1 release series.

Text_Template 1.1.4
-------------------

* Improved error message in case `renderTo()` cannot write to the target file.

Text_Template 1.1.3
-------------------

* No changes.

Text_Template 1.1.2
-------------------

* No changes.

Text_Template 1.1.1
-------------------

* No changes.
